resources.string: Hello,this is a demo from my project. It is a custom app for tablets, so people are not allowed to exit it but I left a backdoor to exit. The notification bar is banned by put a top layer. To make the home and back button disappear, you need to add the following line at the end of /system/build.prop

qemu.hw.mainkeys=1 To exit, tap 4 times within 3 seconds on the upper left corner, the exit dialog will be evoked. And when the wifi or bluetooth is turned down, it will turn on automatically in 12 seconds.
